title: House of 1000 Corpses - Vintage VHS Edition
description:
This is "House of 1000 Corpses" presented as if it was actually released in the early 80&#039;s on Home Video. The film has been over-cropped to 1.33:1 FULL SCREEN, the image has been slightly bleached and additional grain has been added. There is even a fake "tracking" issue in the middle of the film! Captin Spaulding, Grandpa Hugo, Stucky, the Cops, and Denise&#039;s father have all been removed from the film. The idea was to pace the film like an older horror flick. No more flashy cuts, outragous editing or over-the-top dialogue. It&#039;s now a retro, old-skool horror flick.

For best results, after downloaded and burned onto DVD, transfer this edit to an old, worn VHS tape.

Included with this download is the film in .vob format and VHS artwork.

POKE SOME SMOT AND SEEEEEEEEEEEEEED!

For more info., go to: w w w . f r e e w e b s . c o m / r e t r o h o r r o r r e m i x /

WATCH FOR OTHER "VINTAGE VHS EDITIONS" IN THE NEAR FUTURE!

From Your Friends At RETRO HORROR REMIX
